snippet.title: FIRE the first dreamer – Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Info: https://www.sicgames.co.uk/
Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2136420/FIRE_The_First_Dreamer/

FIRE the first dreamer
"Embark on a mystical open world journey through over 40 square miles of untamed Preseli mountains in Wales. Unravel ancient mysteries in an enigmatic language, summon the magic of totem animals to aid your survival, and explore a landscape echoing with the whispers of our ancestors. Inspired by true a true story, let the fire of destiny guide your dreams in this captivating adventure."
